elements.text: It is wedding season, and you are super excited to go to your friend's wedding. When you get there, you notice that most people have a date, but you don't have one. You remember how excited you are for your friend and have a great time...

elements.name: Going to a Wedding_Romantic Relationships_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
